titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to remove the 100 percent tariff imposed on Roquefort cheese.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/25/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to remove the 100% tariff imposed on Roquefort cheese.
